ISSUE.TITLE: Rename GITNESS_URL_BASE to HARNESS_URL_BASE
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: In order to pass a custom dns name and other config you need to pass environment variables ... they are here https://github.com/harness/harness/blob/077256b69c16ebe26ae7c85284ef6b3101bd3c80/types/config.go#L57 and they still refer to GITNESS instead of HARNESS I suggest to correct that ;)
